Headline: Updated: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Halsted, Belmont and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Halsted, Belmont and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway and #62 Archer Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Randolph

Headline: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed near Diversey
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line trains are standing near Diversey due to police activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
